UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Evaluating the Bioactivity of a Novel Antimicrobial and Anticancer Peptide, Dermaseptin-PS4(Der-PS4), from the Skin Secretion of Phyllomedusa sauvagii.
Literature.Author: Chen D, Zhou X, Chen X, Huang L, Xi X, Ma C, Zhou M, Wang L, Chen T

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human microvascular endothelial cells HMEC-1:50% Cell death=460 µM,Horse erythrocytes:8% Hemolysis=32 µM,Horse erythrocytes:18% Hemolysis=64 µM,Horse erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=128 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MIC=8µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MIC=32µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 10788(MBC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus NCTC 12493(MBC=16µM),Enterococcus faecalis NCTC 12697(MBC=32µM),Escherichia coli NCTC 10418(MBC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=32µM),Candida albicans NCYC 1467(MFC=16µM),Human glioblastoma U251-MG(IC50=0.05766µM),Human squamous lung carcinoma NCI-H157(IC50=0.19µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MDA-MB-435S(MIC=0.11µM),Human breast adenocarcinoma MCF-7(IC50=0.67µM),Human prostate adenocarcinoma PC-3(IC50=0.44µM)
